Posted By: RIch W.
I have a great collection of 150 19th century tobacco cards on ebay right now under qcardsataol. Also, I can offer a near set of 48 Allen & Ginter Great Generals. Missing only Lee and Gordon. About VG-EX overall with a few better and a few worse. Great set with great artistry and many important cards including Grant, Custer, etc. Price is $2300.00 delivered. Scans available for some cards.

Rich W.
